data.text: @smian711 @V40460101 @nzherald How many community cases were there when mandates were announced? Or 23 days ago when anti-mandate protests descended upon Wellington?
@haynepapi @V40460101 @nzherald That's a great argument if there wasn't 100,000 cases the majority of which were spread by vaccinated people lol.
@smian711 @V40460101 @nzherald We don’t get to choose whether or not we’re allowed to work in a safe manner? How could the government do this to us?
@Ironman_peter @nzherald Western Australia is reopening its borders to international visitors. They are still very much living with Covid restrictions.

@haynepapi @nzherald Our numbers were 1000 a day. We opened 10000 a day. Look at Western Australia.  Their numbers are increasing and they open up in a few days.  You don’t need low numbers to open. Omicron is a cold compared to delta
@haynepapi @V40460101 @nzherald No, not choose between their career as a police officer and a vaccine. Oh wait that's already been deemed illegal.
@nzherald About bloody time. These morons don’t know how lucky they are, to paraphrase Fred Dagg.
